text: Hi every one, I'm new on HubSpot, I did the basic tutorial on the academy, and I had an important question, there is a way to have different environment that the "production"? i mean if I can have running different version with the same account  like develop environment, testing environment and production?. thanks in advance
There is a seperate sandbox for crerating pages that can later be puched to production. HubSpot calls it Staging
Hey this is dope. I'm going to learn this overnight and dump WordPress #controversial
so good. at every step of the way the tutor is telling how template devs not to mess up templates
